code: import{useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Score.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Score(){const{state}=useLocation();const{role,level,score,total,userAnswers,questions}=state||{};const navigate=useNavigate();const incorrect=questions.filter((q,i)=>userAnswers[i]!==q.answerIndex);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"score-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Quiz Results"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Role:"})," ",role]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Level:"})," ",level]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Score:"})," ",score*10," / ",total*10]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:score>=total/2?'ðŸŽ‰ Great job!':'ðŸ“š Keep practicing!'}),incorrect.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"review-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Review Incorrect Answers"}),incorrect.map((q,i)=>{const index=questions.indexOf(q);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"review-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:["Q",index+1,":"]})," ",q.question]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"label",children:"Your answer:"})," ",q.options[userAnswers[index]]||'No answer']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"label",children:"Correct answer:"})," ",q.options[q.answerIndex]]})]},i);})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"dashboard-button",onClick:()=>navigate('/dashboard'),children:"Back to Dashboard"})]});}export default Score;
